tooltip.drones.equip_hint: Equip in Head Slot to use.
drones.ability.arrow_launcher.0: Automatically shoots arrows as nearby enemies.
drones.ability.light.0: Lights up the area around the drone.
drones.ability.melee_attack.1: Also attacks neutral/friendly mobs if the player attacks them.
drones.ability.mining_support.0: Helps the player when mining blocks, increasing the block break speed.
drones.ability.pickup.0: Collects nearby items and brings them to the player.
drones.ability.saw.0: When the player starts breaking logs of a tree,
drones.ability.saw.1: the drone will harvest the entire tree.
drone.message.assembled_desc: The drone has been added to your inventory.
